solution_line_template: Out of 5 bags, he had {first_bag_brown_mms}+{second_bag_brown_mms}+{third_fourth_bag_brown_mms}+{third_fourth_bag_brown_mms}+{fifth_bag_brown_mms} = <<{first_bag_brown_mms}+{second_bag_brown_mms}+{third_fourth_bag_brown_mms}+{third_fourth_bag_brown_mms}+{fifth_bag_brown_mms}={total_brown_mms}>>{total_brown_mms} brown M&M's

He ate {num_bags} bags so the average number of brown M&M's per bag was {total_brown_mms}/{num_bags} = <<{total_brown_mms}/{num_bags}={average_brown_mms_per_bag}>>{average_brown_mms_per_bag} brown M&M's
